data.scheme_name: Financial Assistance to Mussel Culture and Oyster Farming in Goa - Proprietorship, Self Help Group, Co-operative society - Existing
data.benefits: The scheme provides financial assistance up to Rs. 1.30 Lakhs for setting up of in estuarine waters and in open sea.
data.eligibility: The applicants who are Fish Farmer/ Individual/ Registered Self Help Groups/ Societies/ Associations, interested in setting up the Mussel Culture/ Oyster Farming Unit in Goa and must be  a resident of Goa for the last fifteen years are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions: Applicant should undergo training programme on Mussel Culture/ Oyster Farming organized by the Fisheries Department/ MPEDA/ ICAR/ any other institute.
data.beneficiaries: The applicants who are Fish Farmer/ Individual/ Registered Self Help Groups/ Societies/ Associations, interested in setting up the Mussel Culture/ Oyster Farming Unit in Goa and must be  a resident of Goa for the last fifteen years are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites: Applicant should undergo training programme on Mussel Culture/ Oyster Farming organized by the Fisheries Department/ MPEDA/ ICAR/ any other institute.
data.context: Sustainable and responsible increase in Fish production in the State while contributing towards social and economic growth of the Fisherâ€™s and Fish Farmers and ensuing nutritional security of the State
data.objective: To sustainably harvest Marine Fisheries resources, provide Infrastructure facilities to the Fishermen promote aquaculture and improve the Socio-economic conditions of the Fishermen and generate employment and food security in a holistic way.
data.description:
1. Scheme provides following financial assistance: 1. Setting up of Unit in Estuarine Waters: 50% subsidy limited to Rs. 0.25 lakhs per unit, maximum for 2 units.
  2. Each unit in the Estuarine Water will be of size 4 mtrs X 4 mtrs. 2. Setting up of Unit in Open Sea 50% subsidy limited to Rs. 0.40 lakhs per unit, maximum for 2 units. 
  3. Each Unit in the Open Sea will be of size 6 mtrs X 6 mtrs.
data.how_to_apply: The applications in the prescribed format to be submitted to Directorate of Fisheries.
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the benefit after the approval of the application by the concerned authority.
data.checklist_info_a:
Proof of Identity.
Photographs (2 nos.).
Documents for the Proof of Availability of Land (if applicable).
   A For Owners
      (i) Copy of the Land Deed.
      (ii) Form 1 & Form 14.
   B For Lessee
      (i) NOC from the Land Owner.
      (ii) Registered Lease Agreement.
Proof of Availability of Finance.
Detailed Project Report.
Estuarine Unit in River/Open Sea: NOC from Concerned Authority.
Certificate of Experience.
Expenditure Details.
Design/Layout of Unit.
Mandate Form.
data.checklist_info_c: Applicant can apply by going to nearest Directorate of Fisheries office- https://fisheries.goa.gov.in/contact-us-2/#
data.checklist_info_d: Applicant can apply by going to nearest Directorate of Fisheries office- https://fisheries.goa.gov.in/contact-us-2/#
data.beneficiary: Specific Industries - Proprietorship, Self Help Group, Co-operative society - Goa - All MSMEs, All Non-MSMEs
data.lifecycle: Required Credit Support for Scale - Up
